Class TypeTagRuntime

java.lang.Object
org.dellroad.typetags.core.TypeTagRuntime
public final class TypeTagRuntime extends Object
Runtime functionality required by the bytecode modifications applied by the TypeTagsWeaver.

  • Method Details

    • validatorFor

      public static TypeTagValidator validatorFor(Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType)
      Create an instance of the TypeTagValidator class associated with the specified @TypeTag meta-annotated type annotation class.
      Parameters:
      annotationType - a @TypeTag meta-annotated annotation type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if annotationType is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if annotationType is not meta-annotated with @TypeTag
